postScript:
:SET &RID# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*EXITCODE=*")
:PROCESS &RID#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&RID#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &EXITCODE# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &EXITCODE# = ADD(&EXITCODE#,1)
:  SET &EXITCODE# = SUBSTR(&LINE#,&EXITCODE#)
:  PUBLISH &EXITCODE#,,WORKFLOW
!:  IF &EXITCODE# > 0
!:    MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1800
!:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS

! DB HOSTNAME
:SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,REP,"*DB_RUNNING_DC=*")
:PROCESS &HND#
:  SET &LINE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#)
:  PRINT &LINE#
:  SET &DB_RUNNING_DC# = STR_FIND(&LINE#,"=")
:  SET &DB_RUNNING_DC# = ADD(&DB_RUNNING_DC#,1)
:  SET &DB_RUNNING_DC# = SUBSTR(&LINE#, &DB_RUNNING_DC#)
:  IF &DB_RUNNING_DC# <> ""
:    PUBLISH &DB_RUNNING_DC#,,TOP
:  ELSE
:    MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1800
:  ENDIF
:ENDPROCESS
:CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
preScript:
:DEFINE &IAGENTS#,string,2
:DEFINE &OAGENTS#,string,2
:DEFINE &AAGENT#,string,3

:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB('${IN_AGENT#}', '[','')
:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB(&TMP#, ']','')
:SET &TMP# = STR_SUB(&TMP#, '"','')

:FILL &IAGENTS#[] = STR_SPLIT(&TMP#,",")
:SET &RUNVAR# = 1
:SET &LEN# = LENGTH(&IAGENTS#[])

:WHILE &RUNVAR# LE &LEN#
:  FILL &AAGENT#[] = STR_SPLIT(&IAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#],".")
:  SET &AGENT_UC# = "&AAGENT#[1]"
:  SET &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#] = "&AGENT_UC#.os"
:  SET &AGENT_ALIVE# = SYS_HOST_ALIVE(&OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#])
:  PRINT "Agent &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#], Alive: &AGENT_ALIVE#"
:  IF &AGENT_ALIVE# = "Y"
:    SET &AGENT# = &OAGENTS#[&RUNVAR#]
:PUB &AGENT#
:    SET &RUNVAR# = &LEN# + 1
:  ENDIF
:  SET &RUNVAR# = &RUNVAR# + 1
:ENDWHILE

!:SET &LOGIN# = &IN_LOGIN#
!:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.PREPARE_JOB

processingCommand.script:
echo ">> Hostname: `hostname`"
echo ">> Shell: $SHELL"
echo ">> Username: `whoami`"
echo ">> Parameters: ${IN_PARAMETERS#}"
echo ">> Executing: ${IN_SCRIPT_NAME#} ${IN_PARAMETERS#}"
echo ">> Script output: "
${IN_SCRIPT_NAME#} ${IN_PARAMETERS#}
EXITCODE=$?
if [[ $EXITCODE -eq 2 ]]; then
  EXITCODE=0
  echo ">> Warning: Script exited with exitcode 2!"
  echo "EXITCODE=$EXITCODE"
else
  echo "EXITCODE=$EXITCODE"
fi
exit $EXITCODE
